text: The 1921 Washington State Cougars football team was an American football team that represented Washington State College during the 1921 college football season. Head coach Gus Welch led the team to a 2–1–1 mark in the PCC and 4–2–1 overall. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Opponent ! scope="col" | Location ! scope="col" | Score ! scope="col" | Attendance |- ! scope="row" | October 15 | Gonzaga | Away | 54-7 W | 4,000 |- ! scope="row" | October 21 | Idaho | Home | 20-3 W | 5,000 |- ! scope="row" | October 29 | California | P | 0-14 L | 12,000 |- ! scope="row" | November 5 | Oregon | Home | 7-7 T | 6,000 |- ! scope="row" | November 11 | Oregon State | Away | 7-3 W | 10,000 |- ! scope="row" | November 24 | Washington | Away | 14-0 W | 15,000 |- ! scope="row" | December 3 | USC | Pa | 7-28 L | 12,000 |} ==References== Washington State Category:Washington State Cougars football seasons Category:1921 in Washington (state)
